column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The macaron was actually probably one of the best macarons I've had - it was just crunchy enough to give texture yet soft enough to savor each bite without chomping down on jagged pieces of cookie. The kugelhopf
column3: was so unmemorable. It had an orange blossom flavor (which was pretty good)
column5: and it just desperately needed a sauce or drizzle or SOMETHING because it was so dry.
